title: Mouse 4 Button
body:
Hi there.. Been playing LoL for quite some years now.. and up until recently never had issues with the game.. however playing on monday i noticed that my M4B wasnt working in game... I have this button bound to self cast the Champs E if it can be self casted.. so champs like Morg Shield, Karma shield and Nami's auto attack slows..  now the abilities work when using the Alt+e but i sometime need to cast these abilities quick so thats why i use the M4B.. 

I have updated my drivers for the mouse. I have run a repair on the client... i have done everything short of reinstalling the entire game.. in which i dont really want to do cause it will take sometime to reinstall..  any ideas and where im going wrong??

replies.body: I've been having the same problem MB5 not working as well. Seems to have come about with the newer patches. what brand/ model mouse do you use, I have a corsair M65 PRO RGB.

We've seen reports of those buttons not work as a result of the Creator update for Windows 10.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into this with you directly and find some options.
